"Ores of Kvaris":
"Within Retem, in addition to all of the Ores that can
be found within Aelio, you can gather Tetracite and
Pendrite, along with Blizzardium which can only be
found while it is snowing."

"Ores within the area are replenished at
a set time every day, but not necessarily
in the same spots as before."
